title: Crouching Woman
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
H. Max Pechstein [1881-1955]. James L. Winokur [1922-2009] and Sarah M. Winokur, Pittsburgh, PA, by January 1963 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1978 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mr. and Mrs. Winokur lent the work to the exhibition "Art Since 1900 - Privately Owned in the Pittsburgh Area" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January - February 1963.
[2]. The watercolor was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on May 13, 1985. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1985 year-end gift was taken on February 6, 1986.

Updated and under review by CGK.
